data.text:
@erjomkawaii Hi, Hello there! It will be best to directly coordinate with our Cargo team for further assistance on your inquiry. 

https://t.co/x4XXVVTlZA
@patrx1xxx Hi, Patrx1xxx. Our lounge is exclusive to Business class and Mabuhay Miles tier members. Thank you.
@jax_ramos We have sent you a dm, Jacq. Kindly check yor inbox so we can look into this.
@jax_ramos Hi, Jacq. Please note that PAL only follows what the concerned travel authorities mandate. We'll send you a dm so we can ask for the details of the passenger.
@ronaldcarl This is noted, Ronald. Since you have already responded to the said office, kindly wait for their response as well via email. Thank you.
@_ylrhs Our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience, Yellyshi.
@_ylrhs Hi, Yellyshi. Our apologies for this. We'll request for another follow-up from the concerned office. Kindly wait for updates.
@ronaldcarl We're sorry to hear this, Ronald. We were informed that our Baggage team has reached out to you via email. May we clarify if you did not receive any email?
@Brixnnn We have sent you a DM. Thank you.

@ECDRAW15 Hi, rcecdraw. We are truly sorry for the delay on processing of your refund. We assure you that we are committed to fulfill all our refund obligations. We have requested a follow up from the handling office. We will inform you as soon as we receive an update.
@Christo77005940 Hi, Christopher. We have no news on this yet. You may continue to check our website and social media pages for any news about our route expansion.
@loving_f You're welcome, Peace!
@yPod17 Hi, Ariel. We're sorry for this. We have sent you a private message to further assist you on this.

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text: @kokodiaz23 Hello, Kokoy. Ang travel rules at requirements ay iba't iba depende sa inyong final destination. Maaari ninyong i-check ang link na ito para sa karagdagang impormasyon ukol dito: https://t.co/wg2Bxn3jFQ
@vinzcarl Hello, Sophia! We're sorry for the inconvenience. Kindly check our DM, for us to assist you with your concern.
@criszy4u Hi, Criszy! We're sorry for the inconvenience. Kindly check our DM for us to look into your concern. Thank you!
@wayvgg4eva Thank you, Arianne.
@wayvgg4eva Hi, Arianne! We are unable to send you a DM. This may be due to your account's privacy settings. May you kindly check, please? Thank you.
@marieohya This will be allowed for carry-on as long it is good for personal consumption during the flight. Thank you.
@ronaldcarl We have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@istepipayyy @PALMabuhayMiles We have responded to your concern via DM, Steph. Thank you!
@wayvgg4eva Hi, Arianne. We are sorry to hear this. May we know your chosen mode of payment? Did you select the payment center option? Thank you.

@istepipayyy @PALMabuhayMiles (2/2) Once you have successfully booked a flight, you may send us another message with a copy of the infant's birth certificate and ticket number so we can endorse it to our team for correction. Thank you.

@istepipayyy @PALMabuhayMiles (1/2) Hi, Steph. Our system currently has a character limit for passengers with infants. For now, kindly shorten the name of the infant until the system accepts the booking.
@marieohya Hi! May we know the specific product you wish to bring?
@gfysja If you are transiting in Manila, you do not need to comply with the requirements of the Philippines.
@nikkabartolome_ Hi, Alyssa. Kindly change your settings so we can send you a message. Thank you.
@apoltolentino We sent you a message, Apple. Please check your inbox.

urls.title: Fill | myPAL Request Hub
urls.description: Booking requests at your fingertips. The myPAL Request Hub provides passengers with convenient servicing options. Through this secure online form, you can request the following transactions wherever you are: • Rebook due to schedule change, travel restrictions, or cancellations • Convert your Ticket to a Travel Credit • Request for refund • Follow-up on an existing request You can use this online facility in 3 easy steps: 1. Fill out the form 2. Click SUBMIT 3. Receive a confirmation via email Important Reminders: • For more information on your booking change options, visit https://bit.ly/PALPassengerOptions page. • For tickets issued by our partner travel agents, requests on booking changes must be made through your issuing travel agent. • myPAL Request Hub can assist requests for changes to confirmed bookings on Philippine Airlines flights which were made through the PAL Website, PAL Mobile App, PAL Ticket Offices, or PAL’s Reservations Hotline.

data.text: @Deema_Fahad (1/2) You may submit a refund request. However, refunding will depend on your fare rules and ticket restrictions. For your convenience, you may submit your refunding requests by using our myPal Request Hub, please refer to the provided link below. https://t.co/SbQiwFUjiS
@KevinBee59 We're sorry that you feel this way, Kevin. May we know more information on this?

data.text: @gfysja Hello, pi. Travel guide varies per destination. You may check the travel rules and requirements here: https://t.co/wg2Bxn3jFQ
@BlueFever16 Hi, BlueFever! You may check in 2-3 bags as long as the total weight is within 30kgs :)
@ReynaRonette Hi Ronette. Yes, you can bring multiple pieces of check-in baggage.
@filbertkung We are sorry to hear this, Filbert. We sent you a message. Please check your inbox. Thank you.
@iminvincibleofc We regret to learn this, Closed. We sent you a message regarding this matter. Kindly check your inbox.
@valeros_kaye Hi, Kaye! Our apologies for the delay. We've sent you a DM for your details, so we could have this coordinated on your behalf. Kindly check. Thank you!
@PreolcoFaye Hi, Faye! May we know the quantity you wish to bring?
@itsme_d0s Hi, Dos! We've sent you a DM for us to assist you on your prepaid baggage concern.
@mycorrectview Hi, Jack. We apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you. Allow us to look into this. Please do check our DM for us to proceed. Thank you!
@mmmggrrnnn You're welcome!
@Deema_Fahad Hi, Deema. May we know where and when you submitted your refund request? Thank you.

@valeros_kaye Hi, Kaye. We regret to learn of your baggage concern. We are unable to send you a DM. May we request to change your account settings or kindly send us a DM, for us to assist you regarding your concern? Thank you
@ferlenlavcam Hi, iamferlenssi. Thank you for your feedback. We hope for your continued valuable support and patronage in our flag carrier.
@pinkbutterflie8 Hi, wyndee. We regret to learn of your seat concern. We have sent you a DM to assist you in this regard. Thank you.
@girlgreatsmile Hi, thegirlwithagreatsmile. We regret to learn of your concern. We have sent you a DM to assist you on this. Thank you.

@mmmggrrnnn Hi, clrzs. If the travel tax is applicable to the passenger/s, you may opt to include the Travel Tax charge when purchasing your ticket. Please check https://t.co/lMWjbiCY5j for coverage and exemptions. Thank you.
@shark_island_80 Yes.
@shark_island_80 Yes. Note that the companion will have to secure a pass from NAIA Pass Control Office.
@shark_island_80 Hi! A Passenger may be accompanied by a companion up to the check-in counter only.
@KulayPinoy Hi! As checked, your flight will depart at NAIA Terminal 1.
@stanchunghafrvr We're truly sorry to hear this, Jiwon. May we know further details of your concern so we can look into your concern?
@jjksjournals Hi, Jo. You may have it checked-in. However, please note that all items are subject to final assessment at the airport.
@grafeilfelasol If it is available on our site, this means that it is operational as of this writing, Grafeil. :)
